contents: Article 13 (Validity Period) The validity period of a player's registration shall be until the end of the year in which registration is made. However, exceptions are made in the following cases. Revised May 4, 1, 2023. The registration validity period for athletes belonging to school sports teams is until the end of February of the following year, unless the member sports organization determines otherwise in accordance with the registration validity period for elementary, middle, high school, and college advancement. 2. The registration validity period of athletes recommended as electoral candidates for the election of the Korea Sports Council and head of member sports organizations in the following year and registered in the voter list shall be until the election date of the relevant election.
